Articles.Content:
The question and answer format in the support forums is very annoying for discussion type threads (as has been pointed out a number of times before) because as soon as people start voting for answers it becomes difficult to follow the discussion because the default is to show the thread in votes order (and it forgets when you change it so the next time you open the thread you have to change it back to date order again).  See the following thread that was extracted from the devnotes thread and put in support...

I feel this would have been much better placed in the KSP Discussion sub-forum (or possibly Suggestions & Development Discussion) where it would be a normal thread without this issue.  Is there any chance it could be moved (or just have the thread type changed if that is possible, though I presume not) or do you need to be asked by the thread starter?  Given this was moved by a moderator, the thread starter wasn't really @Azimech...
